sourcesContent:
Login or Create an Account

OTP: {{otp}}
Eotp:{{loginStatus}}
OTP: {{otp}} Eotp:{{loginStatus}}

Your personal data will be used to support your experience throughout this website, to manage access to your account, and for other purposes described in our privacy policy.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'] }) export class LoginComponent { otp:any=''; name:any=''; loginStatus:boolean=false; generateOTP() { this.otp = Math.floor((Math.random() * 1000000) + 1); localStorage.setItem('otp',this.otp); } checkOTP() { console.log(localStorage.getItem('otp') , this.name); if (localStorage.getItem('otp') == this.name) { this.loginStatus = true; } else { this.loginStatus = false; } } }
